artist: Engraver: Pietro Antonio Martini; Delineator: After Giovanni-Battista Cipriani
description: soldiers in armor foreground; bishop and priest at altar facing right; castle right distance; field of soldiers between
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

in plate in black: [ CANTO XXVIII/ J.B. Cipriani inv lond.  1774  P.A. Martini Sculp/ Ginnto Carlo all altar, chi statuito/ I suoi gli aveano,al Ciél levò le palme/ E disse: o Dio, c\'hai di morir patito/ Canto XXXVIII. Stanza LXXXII.]; in pencil on plate: [1-277]
title: Canto XXXVIII
